answers.answer: Have you ever been tested for Diabetes?
Is this the fasting test where you drink something nasty?
yes. and then you wait and they draw blood, you drink some more, they draw more blood.If you havent been, might want to have your doc test you
Medicine smells and taste are very common - interferon.....

question: Okay, today I am a little stuffy so not sure if it is a cold or from the Friday shot, but when I breath in through my nose I smell rubbing alcohol. I don't have any on or near me. This has happened before since I have been on tx. Has this happened to anyone else??? I know it is strange, but true....just want to make sure I am not missing anything here!
title: Weird side effect??
